extension.summary: Automatically adds extra artwork for your media.
extension.description: Artwork Beef automatically adds extra artwork for TV shows and movies into your library. It grabs them from wonderful web services and the file system.
extension.disclaimer: Artwork sources: fanart.tv, TheTVDB.com, The Movie Database, TheAudioDB
extension.news: v0.12.0 - Feature: support multiple uniqueids as expanded in Krypton, support TheMovieDB TV scraper in particular - [B]Action:[/B] If you use the TMDB [B]TV scraper[/B], flip the switch in "Advanced" add-on settings - Feature: show latest artwork report in Kodi from the add-on settings - Feature: grab music video artwork from TheAudioDB and fanart.tv - Feature: add option to prefer artwork from The Movie DB when available - Fix: clean file system unsafe characters when matching local set artwork - Fix: more localized strings, including notifications and the artwork report - Fix: another Leia compatibility fix, localized string formatting changes - Cleanup: simplify web service request retries and session management
